verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3091"\w* family \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3091"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w approached|strong="H5066"\w* Eleazar \w the|strong="H3091"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3091"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3091"\w* other \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*

\w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, “\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w*, together \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* livestock.”

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w command|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w these|strong="H3881"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* own \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*:
The first lot came out for the Kohathite clans. The Levites who were descendants of Aaron the priest received thirteen cities by lot from the tribes of Judah, Simeon, and Benjamin.
The remaining descendants of Kohath received ten cities by lot from the tribes of Ephraim, Dan, and the half-tribe of Manasseh.
The descendants of Gershon received thirteen cities by lot from the tribes of Issachar, Asher, Naphtali, and the half-tribe of Manasseh in Bashan.
And the descendants of Merari received twelve cities from the tribes of Reuben, Gad, and Zebulun.

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w allotted|strong="H1486"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w these|strong="H3881"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, together \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w From|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*, \w they|strong="H5414"\w* \w designated|strong="H5414"\w* \w these|strong="H7121"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w by|strong="H7121"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*

\w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Kohathite|strong="H6956"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3878"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w fell|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*:
They gave them Kiriath-arba (that is, Hebron), with its surrounding pasturelands, in the hill country of Judah. (Arba was the father of Anak.)
But they had given the fields and villages around the city to Caleb son of Jephunneh as his possession.
So to the descendants of Aaron the priest they gave these cities, together with their pasturelands: Hebron, a city of refuge for the manslayer, Libnah,
Jattir, Eshtemoa,
Holon, Debir,
Ain, Juttah, and Beth-shemesh—nine cities from these two tribes, together with their pasturelands.

\w And|strong="H4054"\w* \w from|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H1391"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* they gave them \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*, \w Geba|strong="H1387"\w*,
\w Anathoth|strong="H6068"\w*, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w Almon|strong="H5960"\w*—four \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, together \w with|strong="H5892"\w* their \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5892"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*, \w thirteen|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, together \w with|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*, \w were|strong="H1121"\w* given \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron.

\w The|strong="H1961"\w* \w remaining|strong="H3498"\w* Kohathite \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w allotted|strong="H1486"\w* \w these|strong="H3881"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*: From the tribe of Ephraim
they were given Shechem in the hill country of Ephraim (a city of refuge for the manslayer), Gezer,
Kibzaim, and Beth-horon—four cities, together with their pasturelands.
From the tribe of Dan they were given Elteke, Gibbethon,
Aijalon, and Gath-rimmon—four cities, together with their pasturelands.
And from the half-tribe of Manasseh they were given Taanach and Gath-rimmon—two cities, together with their pasturelands.
In all, ten cities, together with their pasturelands, were given to the rest of the Kohathite clans.

\w This|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H5892"\w* what \w the|strong="H2677"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H2677"\w* Gershonites \w were|strong="H1121"\w* given: From the half-tribe of Manasseh they were given Golan in Bashan, a city of refuge for the manslayer, and Beeshterah—two cities, together with their pasturelands.
From the tribe of Issachar they were given Kishion, Daberath,
Jarmuth, and En-gannim—four cities, together with their pasturelands.
From the tribe of Asher they were given Mishal, Abdon,
Helkath, and Rehob—four cities, together with their pasturelands.
And from the tribe of Naphtali they were given Kedesh in Galilee (a city of refuge for the manslayer), Hammoth-dor, and Kartan—three cities, together with their pasturelands.
In all, thirteen cities, together with their pasturelands, were given to the Gershonite clans.

\w This|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* what \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Merarite \w clan|strong="H4940"\w* (\w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w rest|strong="H3498"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*) \w were|strong="H1121"\w* given: From the tribe of Zebulun they were given Jokneam, Kartah,
Dimnah, and Nahalal—four cities, together with their pasturelands.
From the tribe of Reuben they were given Bezer, Jahaz,
Kedemoth, and Mephaath—four cities, together with their pasturelands.
And from the tribe of Gad they were given Ramoth in Gilead, a city of refuge for the manslayer, Mahanaim,
Heshbon, and Jazer—four cities in all, together with their pasturelands.
In all, twelve cities were allotted to the clans of Merari, the remaining Levite clans.

\w For|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w then|strong="H1121"\w*, \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w forty-eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*, together \w with|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*, \w within|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w territory|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Each|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* \w surrounding|strong="H5439"\w* \w pasturelands|strong="H4054"\w*; \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w true|strong="H3651"\w* \w for|strong="H5892"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

Thus \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* fathers, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w took|strong="H3423"\w* \w possession|strong="H3423"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w settled|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* \w on|strong="H5117"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w side|strong="H5439"\w*, \w just|strong="H3605"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* fathers. \w None|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w enemies|strong="H3027"\w* could \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w enemies|strong="H3027"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w Not|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w promises|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w failed|strong="H5307"\w*; \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* fulfilled.
